short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks website relevance against your focus goal

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enter what you want to be focused on, and we'll help you stay on track! 

Every new website you open results in a quick check, using some of the content on the page, against the stated focus you have. If your new tab doesn't pass the sniff test, we'll shoot you a gentle nudge to get you back on track.
